title: Best of The Program | Guests: Ken Paxton & Justin Haskins | 12/9/20
description:
Pennsylvania has new extreme coronavirus restrictions. The American people have lost trust in government officials and the media. Attorney General Ken Paxton breaks down Texas’ election lawsuit filed against four battleground states. Will other states soon back it? The Heartland Institute’s Justin Haskins talks the "Digital New Deal," Big Tech censorship of free speech, and who’s funding it.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
